properties.title: Gillingham Adult Education Centre
properties.description: Adult Education Centre, Green Street, Gillingham, Kent, ME7 5TJWeb page http://www.medway.gov.uk/educationandlearning/adultlearning/learningcentres/gillinghamcentre.aspxInformation The centre has two IT rooms, both accommodating 12 people. It also offers two halls accommodating 80 seated and 100 standing. Just off High Street Gillingham, the Gillingham Centre is located on Green Street, five minutes walk from Gillingham Railway Station. Arriva buses numbered 101, 114, 136, 176, 182 serve the Gillingham Town Centre and will set passengers down about five minutes walk from the centre in most cases. Public car parking is available near the centre at Balmoral car park and Black Lion (both up to four hours). Pay and display street parking in Green Street is limited to a maximum of two hours.Telephone number 01634338400Email enquiries@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Rochester Adult Education Centre
properties.description: Adult Education Centre, High Street, Rochester, Kent, ME1 1EWWeb page http://www.medway.gov.uk/educationandlearning/adultlearning/learningcentres/rochestercentre.aspxInformation The centre has two rooms; one accommodating 12 people, and the other, 11. Both rooms offer up-to-date IT packages. There is also a large room that can accommodate 100 standing, 60 seated. Just off Rochester High Street, the Rochester Centre, Eastgate, is located five to10 minutes walk from Rochester Railway Station. Arriva buses numbered 133,136, 140, 141, 151, 172, 173, 193, 633, 668, 700 and 701 stop right outside the centre on Corporation Street. Public car parking is available near the centre at Blue Boar Lane and Almon Place (both up to five hours maximum stay) and for longer courses there is the Market Car Park in Corporation Street which offers long stay.Telephone number 01634338400Email enquiries@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Chatham South Adult Education Centre
properties.description: Adult Education Centre, Chatham South School, Letchworth Avenue, Chatham, Kent, ME4 6NTWeb page http://www.medway.gov.uk/educationandlearning/adultlearning/learningcentres.aspxInformation Physical access and other relevant facilities available to students with disabilities vary from centre to centre. Each centre has its own information sheet providing information on ramps, accessible toilet facilities, guide rails, audio/visual aids and car parking. To obtain a copy of a centre information sheet, please use the contact information.Telephone number 01634404277Email enquiries@medway.gov.uk
